title: Strengthening Leadership Competencies: Scientific Problem-Solving Skills Development Through Failure-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational science concepts (middle school level)
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can reconstruct core concepts through at least three productive failure experiences in scientific problem situations
Learners can analyze failure cases using peer feedback and propose improvement plans with over 70% accuracy
Learners can write reports explaining over 80% of the scientific problem-solving process in final projects

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
